lead_paragraph: Aiming to take audiences to the place where new media art and independent film overlap, the inaugural Anemic Festival (anemicfestival.cz) runs from Nov. 4 to 16.
snippet: Aiming to take audiences to the place where new media art and independent film overlap, the inaugural Anemic Festival runs in Prague from Nov. 4 to 16.

headline.main: Short Films, Unexpected Spaces and More at Prague Festival

abstract: Aiming to take audiences to the place where new media art and independent film overlap, the inaugural Anemic Festival runs in Prague from Nov. 4 to 16.
